column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Despite looking like so many generic restaurants in the first floor of a newly built or renovated luxury apartment building
column2: this is still a lou malnati's and it is still excellent. Also
column3: the person on the wall behind the register is either Lou Malnati who looks like Newman from Seinfeld or it's actually just Newman from Seinfeld. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
